name: AXChart
desc: A protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary for an accessibility element to act as a chart.

items.name: var accessibilityChartDescriptor: AXChartDescriptor?
items.desc: A semantic description of an accessible chart or graph in the form of a chart descriptor.

items.name: class AXChartDescriptor
items.desc: An object that contains all the semantic information about an accessible chart.
